Message:
If it’s the red dripping
from my favorite dolls,
it must be a pretty red—

the same one that
drove me crazy.

Emma was the one
that told me that.

So, I went after my favorite
dolls so they could show me
that pretty red.

But, it’s weird.
Everyone will be
playing with me one day,

Isn’t that weird, Emma?
Where did everyone go?

It’s okay. I’m sure we’ll
meet again somewhere.
So, for now...
